org.activebpel.rt.bpel
Interface IAeVariable

All Superinterfaces:
IAeLocatableObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeVariable
public interface IAeVariable
extends IAeLocatableObject

Describes the interface used for interacting with business process variables these Business Process variables are associated with either messages or standard schema described xml data.

Method Summary

          Clears the value for the variable.

validate

public void validate()
              throws AeBpelException
Performs validation against the data set for this variable. An AeBusinessProcessException is thrown if the data is invalid.

Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException
AeBpelException

validate

public void validate(boolean aAllowEmptyPartData)
              throws AeBusinessProcessException
Performs validation against the data set for this variable. An AeBusinessProcessException is thrown if the data is invalid.

Parameters:
aAllowEmptyPartData - set to True if an empty message should pass validation False otherwise
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

clear

public void clear()
Clears the value for the variable. Called from the variable's declaring scope each time the scope is going to execute since the variable's state is not preserved across invocations.

hasData

public boolean hasData()
Returns true if and only if the variable has data.

initializeForAssign

public void initializeForAssign(java.lang.String aPartName)
Initializes the variable with its default value prior to being used in an 's copy operation. If the variable (and part) has already been initialized then this call has no effect.

Parameters:
aPartName - The part name of null if the variable is not a message.
